column4: hi guys, microphone problem here..... i have a logitech quickcam with a built-in microphone. The webcam works fine, but the microphone doesn't work... I tried in Skype and in Sound Recorder, nothing.... so probably I have to enable something in the options... does anybody know how i can solve the problem?
try selecting a different driver for audio in skype
there are options in audio seciton
in the bottom of the window of skype, there is an icon with menu
